languages.text: В гротескной фигуре существа люди Вольного Торговца узнают друкарскую медузу — паразита, способного фиксировать эмоции и передавать их своим хозяевам. Эта тварь оставлена здесь как пикт-рекордер, чтобы напитаться страданиями жертв.

traits.locale_text: В гротескной фигуре существа люди Вольного Торговца узнают друкарскую медузу — паразита, способного фиксировать эмоции и передавать их своим хозяевам. Эта тварь оставлена здесь, как пикт-рекордер, чтобы напитаться страданиями жертв.

languages.text: The Rogue Trader's people recognise the grotesque figure as a Drukhari medusa — a parasite capable of registering emotions and transferring them to its masters. This thing was left here as the equivalent of a pict-recorder, collecting the suffering of the Drukhari's victims.
languages.original_text: В гротескной фигуре существа люди Вольного Торговца узнают друкарскую медузу — паразита, способного фиксировать эмоции и передавать их своим хозяевам. Эта тварь оставлена здесь как пикт-рекордер, чтобы напитаться страданиями жертв.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader's people recognize the grotesque figure as a Drukhari medusa — a parasite capable of registering emotions and transferring them to its masters. This thing was left here as the equivalent of a pict-recorder, collecting the suffering of the Drukhari's victims.

The Rogue Trader's people recognize the grotesque figure as a Drukhari medusa — a parasite capable of registering emotions and transferring them to its masters. This thing was left here as the equivalent of a pict-recorder, collecting the suffering of the Drukhari's victims.

The Rogue Trader's people recognise the grotesque figure as a Drukhari medusa — a parasite capable of registering emotions and transferring them to its masters. This thing was left here as the equivalent of a pict-recorder, collecting the suffering of the Drukhari's victims.

The Rogue Trader's people recognise the grotesque figure as a Drukhari medusa — a parasite capable of registering emotions and transferring them to its masters. This thing was left here as the equivalent of a pict-recorder, collecting the suffering of the Drukhari's victims.

The Rogue Trader's people recognise the grotesque figure as a Drukhari medusa — a parasite capable of registering emotions and transferring them to its masters. This thing was left here as the equivalent of a pict-recorder, collecting the suffering of the Drukhari's victims.

languages.text: 行商浪人的手下辨认出，这只怪诞的生物是黑暗灵族的美杜莎，这种寄生虫可以记录情绪，并将记录下来的情绪转移至主人身上。这个东西就相当于一台视讯记录仪，留在这里是为了从那些受害者身上收集痛苦。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's people recognise the grotesque figure as a Drukhari medusa — a parasite capable of registering emotions and transferring them to its masters. This thing was left here as the equivalent of a pict-recorder, collecting the suffering of the Drukhari's victims.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的手下辨认出，这只怪诞的生物是黑暗灵族的美杜莎，这种寄生虫可以记录情绪，并将记录下来的情绪转移至主任身上。这个东西就相当于一台视讯记录仪，留在这里是为了从那些受害者身上收集痛苦。

languages.text: ローグトレーダーの者たちは、そのグロテスクな姿をデュカーリのメデューサであると認識している。メデューサは、感情を記録し、それを主人に伝える寄生虫である。デュカーリの犠牲者の苦しみを記録するピクト・レコーダーのようなものだ。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's people recognise the grotesque figure as a Drukhari medusa — a parasite capable of registering emotions and transferring them to its masters. This thing was left here as the equivalent of a pict-recorder, collecting the suffering of the Drukhari's victims.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーの者たちは、そのグロテスクな姿をデュカーリのメデューサであると認識している。メデューサは、感情を記録し、それを主人に伝える寄生虫である。デュカーリの犠牲者の苦しみを記録するピクト・レコーダーのようなものだ。

languages.text: La tripulación {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente reconoce la grotesca figura como una medusa Drukhari, un parásito capaz de registrar emociones y transferirlas a sus amos. Esta cosa fue dejada aquí como el equivalente de un grabaimágenes, recogiendo el sufrimiento de las víctimas de los Drukhari.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's people recognise the grotesque figure as a Drukhari medusa — a parasite capable of registering emotions and transferring them to its masters. This thing was left here as the equivalent of a pict-recorder, collecting the suffering of the Drukhari's victims.

traits.locale_text: La tripulación {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente reconoce la grotesca figura como una medusa Drukhari, un parásito capaz de registrar emociones y transferirlas a sus amos. Esta cosa fue dejada aquí como el equivalente de un grabaimágenes, recogiendo el sufrimiento de las víctimas de los Drukhari.

languages.text: Die Leute {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} erkennen die groteske Gestalt als Drukhari-Medusa — einen Parasiten, der Emotionen registrieren und an seine Meister übermitteln kann. Dieses Ding wurde als Äquivalent eines Vid-Rekorders hier zurückgelassen, um das Leid der Opfer der Drukhari zu sammeln.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's people recognise the grotesque figure as a Drukhari medusa — a parasite capable of registering emotions and transferring them to its masters. This thing was left here as the equivalent of a pict-recorder, collecting the suffering of the Drukhari's victims.

traits.locale_text: Die Leute {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} erkennen die groteske Gestalt als Drukhari-Medusa — einen Parasiten, der Emotionen registrieren und an seine Meister übermitteln kann. Dieses Ding wurde als Äquivalent eines Vid-Rekorders hier zurückgelassen, um das Leid der Opfer der Drukhari zu sammeln.

languages.text: Les hommes {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} reconnaissent la silhouette grotesque d'une méduse drukhari, un parasite capable d'enregistrer les émotions avant de les retransmettre à ses maîtres. Cette chose est en quelque sorte l'équivalent d'un pictoenregistreur, conçu pour capter la souffrance des victimes des Drukharis.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's people recognise the grotesque figure as a Drukhari medusa — a parasite capable of registering emotions and transferring them to its masters. This thing was left here as the equivalent of a pict-recorder, collecting the suffering of the Drukhari's victims.

traits.locale_text: Les hommes {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} reconnaissent la silhouette grotesque d'une médusaée drukhari, un parasite capable d'enregistrer les émotions avant de les retransmettre à ses maîtres. Cette chose est en quelque sorte l'équivalent d'un pictoenregistreur, conçu pour capter la souffrance des victimes des Drukhari.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in adamları, bu grotesk yaratığın bir Drukhari medüzü olduğunu fark ediyor. Duyguları kayda alıp efendilerine aktarabilen bir parazit bu. Drukharilerin kurbanlarının ızdırabını foto kaydedici misali toplasın diye bu yaratığı buraya koymuşlar.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's people recognise the grotesque figure as a Drukhari medusa — a parasite capable of registering emotions and transferring them to its masters. This thing was left here as the equivalent of a pict-recorder, collecting the suffering of the Drukhari's victims.
